name: BUGS! AAAAAAH!
description:
This game was submitted for the first Indie tales Game Jam.

In BUGS! you play as a miner in an asteroid in the asteroid belt of Saturn, trapped in a small room where you defend a drill mining for precious ores, while getting attacked by big insects. Your goal: survive as long as possible.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move around.
  • Left mouse button to fire your LMG.

Have fun!

Game made by Tenseven,  Music by Hacky.

Made in a team of two.
